understanding.C: PR #783 adds a minimal SLI snapshot for metrics-echo. The current probe from the devbox shows SUCCESS_RATE=0% (20/20 non-200). This likely indicates a reachability, Host header, TLS, or auth/config mismatch from that vantage point rather than the SLI logic itself. It is acceptable as a baseline snapshot, but we should quickly verify exact status classes and correct the probe target/headers/auth or run the probe from inside the cluster.

acceptance: Accept PR #783 as a minimal baseline snapshot. I will run the above checks from the devbox to identify the exact non-200 cause, adjust target/headers/auth or shift the probe to an in-cluster vantage point as needed, and then refresh the snapshot.
